```{r}

# plot penguins
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(penguins, 
       aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Penguin Body Mass vs. Flipper Length",
       x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
       y = "Body Mass (g)",
       color = "Species")

p
```
